title: can you guys make a pyramid head tryndamere skin?

replies.body: Kinda like [this](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BIQp_UZ8Pbc/VVOjkWLfylI/AAAAAAAAp24/fMzm3amgClc/s640/trynd.jpg)? :D (We took a lot of inspiration from *Silent Hill*).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=sUm46bAn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-01T03:21:02.772+0000)
>
> Kinda like [this](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BIQp_UZ8Pbc/VVOjkWLfylI/AAAAAAAAp24/fMzm3amgClc/s640/trynd.jpg)? :D (We took a lot of inspiration from *Silent Hill*).

I know it's a little late, and it's only a 750, but you should've removed his entire VO for the skin.
Just turn the character audio off. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=sUm46bAn,comment-id=000000020002,timestamp=2015-06-01T16:54:12.901+0000)
>
> Just turn the character audio off. :D

Well ahit
Yeah you right.
Or muffle it " My mmmf mmmmf stronger mmmf mmmf left mmf."

> [{quoted}](name=Best KhaZix Void,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=sUm46bAn,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-06-01T07:36:03.886+0000)
>
> I know it's a little late, and it's only a 750, but you should've removed his entire VO for the skin.

that would be interesting
Why isn't this a thing though?

Why isn't what a thing, the skin she just linked that is literally coming out this patch?
I think it is safe to say that it is indeed, a thing.
I didn't know, I rarely check the news on here.

Yeah, just like that! It's almost like that skin's in the game with how crisp it looks there!

(No but seriously great skin guys, keep up the good work)
kinda. like you should get permission from the makers and replicate it. when he ults it gets all dark and peeley like in the movie pleeeeaasssssssse
Is anything more going to be added to the skin?
Nope! This dude is coming out this patch.

Now on top of raping towers Trynda will rape some mannequins.
Thx Rito
I was right! I knew it! >=D As soon as I saw it, I was like "What? Silent Hill Tryndamere? Cool". lol. I always liked the huge pyramid guy on the Silent Hill movies.
RIP Silent Hills.....I will miss ye.
